name: 64-bit operating system kernel
description:
Wrote a 64-bit operating system kernel from scratch using nasm, qemu, xorriso, grub-common, x86_64_elf-id, 
 x86_64_elf-gcc and used qemu-system- x86_64 as an emulator.
